title: Kim Kardashian says 'I love you forever' as she wishes Caitlyn Jenner happy 70th birthday
text:
Kim Kardashian took to social media on Monday to share a sweet note for former step parent Caitlyn Jenner.

The 39-year-old beauty was seen in a flashback photo from 2018 with the I Am Cait star as she wished her well.

'Happy 70th birthday Caitlyn Jenner. I love you forever,' said the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star.

So much love: Kim Kardashian took to social media on Monday to share a sweet note for former step parent Caitlyn Jenner as they were seen in a flashback photo

Love love love! 'Happy 70th birthday Caitlyn Jenner. I love you forever,' said the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star

Mother-of-four Kim had long plaits and a hoodie on from Kanye West's Yeezy line.

Caitlyn was in a light grey turtleneck with bangs and her dark hair worn down.

The two were posing for the camera at home as Kim rested a hand on Cait.

Kylie also took to social media to wish Cait well. She was seen with the former Olympian as well as sister Kendall Jenner. They were at a dinner table with white roses.

Kylie said, 'Happy birthday Caitlyn Jenner I'm so proud of everything you are and all you've accomplished. A real life super hero. I love you.'

From Kylie: Kylie also took to social media to wish Cait well. She was seen with the former Olympian as well as sister Kendall Jenner. They were at a dinner table with white roses

Cait canceled on attending a party at Hollywood, Florida's Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Thursday to avoid a potential unpleasant encounter with Khloé Kardashian amid tension between the pair in recent years.

The reality star did not nix her planned appearance until the last minute, sources told Us.

The Revenge Body personality was advertised in an Instagram post from the hotel as she stood on a balcony at the facility.

So many roses for this lady: Here Jenner showed off her many bouquets

Scott Disick, 36, and gal pal Sofia Richie, 21, joined Khloe, 35, at Thursday's opening of the gambling facility.

They 'looked very in love, holding hands the second before and after the red carpet,' insiders told Page Six of the couple at the event, which was also attended by celebs including Johnny Depp, Morgan Freeman, Bella Thorne and Joe Manganiello.

Khloé and Caitlyn's relationship took a hit after the release of Caitlyn's 2017 memoir The Secrets of My Life, as Khloé took exception to the way her mother Kris Jenner was portrayed.

The hard feelings lingered, as depicted on the family's E! reality show Keeping Up with the Kardashians last year, when Khloé took exception to Kim inviting Caitlyn to the family's annual Christmas Eve bash.

Thanks but no thanks: Caitlyn Jenner canceled on attending party at Hollywood, Florida's Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Thursday to avoid a potential unpleasant encounter with Khloé Kardashian, 35, amid tension between the pair in recent years.

Luxe life: The Revenge Body personality was advertised in an Instagram post from the hotel as she stood on a balcony at the facility

Sore spot: Khloé and Caitlyn's relationship took a hit after the release of Caitlyn's 2018 memoir The Secrets of My Life. Caitlyn was snapped in LA last month

Khloe, speaking in May with the podcast Divorce Sucks with Laura Wasser, said that she and Caitlyn have gotten along fine in recent times and have 'really come a long way' in their dealings with one another.

'It was a struggle for all of us … not because she was transitioning,' she said. 'I think from just how it was all handled.'

News of the incident came as the I Am Cait star celebrated her 70th birthday Monday, as she took to Instagram stories to show off a smattering of floral arrangements she was sent in celebrating the milestone.

One of the floral assortments was from Khloe, who wished her a happy birthday on behalf of herself and daughter True.
description: The 39-year-old beauty was seen in a flashback photo with the I Am Cait star as she wished her well. 'Happy 70th birthday Caitlyn Jenner,' she began her note.
